member.name: CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure that is initialized with default depth-stencil-state values.

member.name: CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure that is initialized with a D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure.
member.param: Address of the D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure that initializes the D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC
member.summary: Represents a depth-stencil-state structure and provides convenience methods for creating depth-stencil-state structures.
